smashy 0.0.0-9000
  • Reference

Density Estimation Learner

Source: R/DensityLearner.R
LearnerDensity.Rd

This learner implements the mlr3::Learner for density estimation Tasks.

  • task_type is set to "density".

  • Creates [Prediction][mlr3::Prediction]s of class [PredictionDensity`].

  • predict_types always has the value "prob".

See also

Other density estimation classes: MeasureDensity, PredictionDensity, TaskDensity, as_prediction_density(), as_task_density(), mlr_learners_density.featureless, mlr_learners_density.np, mlr_measures_density.logloss, mlr_tasks_faithful

Super class

Method new()

Initialize the LearnerDensity object.

Usage

LearnerDensity$new(
  id,
  param_set = ps(),
  predict_types = "prob",
  feature_types = character(0),
  properties = character(0),
  data_formats = "data.table",
  packages = character(0),
  man = NA_character_
)

Method sample()

Sample from the fitted density.

Usage

LearnerDensity$sample(n, lower = NULL, upper = NULL)

Arguments

n

(integer(1))
Number of samples to generate.

lower

(numeric | NULL)
lower bounds, to sample truncated distributions. Must contain NA for non-numeric features. NULL (default): do not truncate.

upper

(numeric | NULL)
upper bounds, to sample truncated distributions. Must contain NA for non-numeric features. NULL (default): do not truncate.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

LearnerDensity$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
